name: Farayola Joshua
introduction: I am a fullstack web developer that loves building scalable systems and products that offer value.

works.title: Play Tic Tac Toe
works.summary: A tic tac toe game featuring an AI opponent
story: This was one of my earliest works. I actually wanted to build a chess engine, but I started with this to understand what it takes to do so. The AI engine uses the MiniMax algorithm to make an optimal choice. It took a while for me to implement the algorithm, but I later understood its concept.

Another challenge was figuring out a representation for the board state. I settled on using binary digits since bit manipulations made it easy to make changes and improved the performance. To not block the main program, the AI runs on a worker thread. This was my first use of worker threads.
This work is hosted on Heroku, it is also available as a PWA.
